TopicTitle: Is there any highlighting light parts?

Articles.Content:
I'm not sure this post goes here, but there's only one forum which have "question" in ther their name.

Well, I downloaded and used some light parts mods, but none of them fit to my purpose: making warning lights.

I mean, light parts shed light around them, but not highlighting themselves much (actually it seems not at all). I want to put a yellow light on my spacecraft to clearly showing that "this part is dangerous: be careful to deal with it!"

I want to know is there any mod for me, or is it possible to make such a part. It would be best to be in cfg script so I can put that into parts I want to use.

Sorry for my English, I think my brain is decaying to forget a lot of things

Edited September 4, 2014 by FennexFox
Aviation Lights. Can do flashing strobes which look great as warning beacons, as well as different colors of marker lights.

Can you post a pic of your ship? The aviation lights mod lights pretty well illuminate everything around them. I'd suggest placing one or two of them judiciously, or five or six of them if you like the Christmas tree effect like me.

You might also be interested in the surface lights mod. http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57778-0-24-Surface-Mounted-Stock-Alike-Lights-for-Self-Illumination

Well, I have the mod and really like it but that's not on this purpose. I want thing itself highlighting, not illuminating things around. I want to post my ship but I'm on mobile...just imagine a neon sign or firetruck warning lights, that's what I want.
